item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, May 26, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Show HN: PgDog – Shard Postgres without extensions (6 points | discuss)

27. Data breach exposes 184M passwords for Google,Microsoft,Facebook (12 points | 3 comments)

29. GitHub issues is almost the best notebook in the world (207 points | 133 comments)
